sentences.en: Can McGrady, entering his 11th NBA season, at long last live up to his nonpareil reputation and deliver a blue-collar, crunch-time effort in the post-season?
sentences.cn: 麦迪即将进入第11个赛季，他能在季后赛的关键时刻咬紧牙关，像那些专干脏活的蓝领队员杀出一条血路，以对得上无上名气吗？

sentences.en: This paper remains a nonpareil platform for writing a column — not just for its readership, but also for its journalistic freedom.
sentences.cn: 它仍然拥有无可匹敌的专栏写作平台——不只为其读者，也为新闻自由。

sentences.en: We may have to agree that the noble Lord a nonpareil as a departmental minister.
sentences.cn: 我们也许只能一致认定:这位高贵的勋爵作为一位大臣不一定算得全善全美.

sentences.en: We may have to agree that the noble Lord is not precisely a nonpareil as a departmental minister.
sentences.cn: 我们也许只能一致认定：这位高贵的勋爵作为一位大臣不一定算得全善全美。

trans.tran_en: having no match or equal; peerless

trans.tran_cn: 无可匹敌的人或物，举世无双的人或物
